translation.ja: ふざけるのはやめろ

translation.en: From the moment I met you, you've just made everything worse.
translation.ja: 君(きみ)がいると事態(じたい)が悪(わる)くなる

translation.en: You know what your problem is? You think too much.
translation.ja: あなたの欠点(けってん)は 考(かんが)えすぎなところ

translation.en: - Where did you... - He must have tossed it in here.
translation.ja: これ どこに？ あいつが捨(す)てたとか？

translation.en: Good thing you were never here.  Never here.
translation.ja: 君(きみ)はここにいなかった

translation.en: I did beat Mitch Williams.
translation.ja: ボクはミッチに勝(か)った

translation.en: Give me that.
translation.ja: 貸(か)して

translation.en: Please don't blow up. Please don't blow up.
translation.ja: ばく発(はつ)しないでよ

translation.en: Welcome cadet. I am BITT! A Binary Intelligence Tech Trainer!
translation.ja: はじめまして　ボクはビット バイナリ･インテリジェンス･ テック･トレーナーさ

translation.en: Searching for updates.
translation.ja: アップデートは…

translation.en: None found.
translation.ja: なし

translation.en: Hey, maybe he can help us get out of this van.
translation.ja: 車(くるま)から出してもらえない？

translation.en: I am sorry but my services are for the exclusive use of Glitch Tech recruits.
translation.ja: 無(む)理(り)だ ボクの仕事(しごと)は 新人(しんじん)グリッチ･テックの訓練(くんれん)

translation.en: I also dispense food and beverages.
translation.ja: あと おやつの提供(ていきょう)

translation.en: Fresh- baked muffin? Mmm.
translation.ja: マフィンをどうぞ

translation.en: I want one for Christmas!
translation.ja: クリスマスにほしい

translation.en: What's a Glitch Tech?
translation.ja: グリッチ･テック？

translation.en: Citizens employed by Hinobi for the purposes of detecting and capturing glitch entities!
translation.ja: ヒノビが採用(さいよう)した グリッチほかく要員(よういん)のことさ

translation.en: Uh, that's us all right!
translation.ja: そうそう 私(わたし)たちは新人テック

translation.en: New trainees reporting for duty. Right, Five?
translation.ja: そうそう 私(わたし)たちは新人テック でしょ？

translation.en: Uh, yeah!
translation.ja: そうさ ボクたちは新人(しんじん)テックだ

translation.en: She and me, we are trainees employed by Hinobi
translation.ja: そうさ ボクたちは新人(しんじん)テックだ さっき君(きみ)が言ってた仕事(しごと)の

translation.en: for the purposes of whatever the purpose is you just said.
translation.ja: さっき君(きみ)が言ってた仕事(しごと)の

translation.en: Very well.
translation.ja: ではガントレットを装着(そうちゃく)して

translation.en: Simply connect these Glitch gauntlets and choose start to begin!
translation.ja: ではガントレットを装着(そうちゃく)して スタートを押(お)す

translation.en: It's got some kinda UI.
translation.ja: これってＵＩ？

translation.en: Like a radar, a minimap and... a targeting crosshair?
translation.ja: レーダーにミニマップに 照準器(しょうじゅんき)

translation.en: Move your wrists up, down and side to side.
translation.ja: 上下左右に うでを動(うご)かして

translation.en: This is known as your targeting area.
translation.ja: ターゲットを決(き)める

translation.en: Oh, I am loving where this is going.
translation.ja: 楽(たの)しくなってきた

translation.en: Glitch signature acquired!
translation.ja: グリッチ検出(けんしゅつ)

translation.en: Now calculating the shortest route.
translation.ja: 最短(さいたん)ルートを計算(けいさん)

translation.en: Uh, shortest route to what?
translation.ja: どこへ行(い)くの？

translation.en: The shortest route to intercept the glitch!
translation.ja: 最短(さいたん)ルートでグリッチへ

translation.en: Whoo- hoo!
translation.ja: 〝ハイスコア〞

translation.en: I hate retro titles.
translation.ja: 古(ふる)いゲームはきらいだ

translation.en: Glitch Techs detected.
translation.ja: グリッチ･テックス接近(せっきん)

translation.en: I said no backup!
translation.ja: １人でやれる

translation.en: You have reached your destination.
translation.ja: 目的地(もくてきち)にとう着(ちゃく)

translation.en: I've had it with you griefers!
translation.ja: もう いいかげんにしろ

translation.en: I am trying to clean the mess you made, and you keep making it worse!
translation.ja: お前(まえ)たちのせいで 事態(じたい)が悪(わる)くなる

translation.en: Chomp Kitty?
translation.ja: ムシャムシャ･キャット？

translation.en: Strategic update. Run away!
translation.ja: 戦略(せんりゃく)をこうしん　にげろ

translation.en: This is no longer my favorite video game!
translation.ja: こんなゲームじゃないのに

translation.en: - Uh, is there an instruction manual? -
translation.ja: トリセツはある？

translation.en: Mitch? You're okay?
translation.ja: ミッチ 大丈夫(だいじょうぶ)？

translation.en: I am stuck in the belly of a malevolent digital construct,
translation.ja: デジタル･モンスターに 食(く)われた

translation.en: so, no, I'm not okay!
translation.ja: 大丈夫(だいじょうぶ)なもんか

translation.en: Help me, you morons!
translation.ja: 助(たす)けろよ

translation.en: You want our help?
translation.ja: ボクたちが君(きみ)を？

translation.en: You're gonna admit what you've done and help us put things right again!
translation.ja: 自分(じぶん)のしたことをみとめて 協力(きょうりょく)して

translation.en: Fine, just get me out of here! The static discharge is frizzing my hair!
translation.ja: わかった　出してくれ 静電気(せいでんき)で かみ型(がた)がくずれた

translation.en: Ooh! Maybe these'll help.
translation.ja: 〝アイテム〞 〝アイテム〞 これ いいかも

translation.en: Let's see. Sparkly gem thingies, feathers, mushrooms... Ooh, pizza!
translation.ja: えっと 宝石(ほうせき)に羽(は)根(ね)にキノコ あと ピザ

translation.en: Hey, furball, ya hungry?
translation.ja: ネコちゃん お腹(なか)すいてる？

translation.en: You fed it a power- up?
translation.ja: パワーアップしちゃった

translation.en: We probably should have stayed in the van.
translation.ja: 車の中にいればよかった

translation.en: Target glitch has gone viral!
translation.ja: グリッチが拡散(かくさん)した

translation.en: What's a glitch?
translation.ja: グリッチって？

translation.en: A glitch is an artificially intelligent plixel construct!
translation.ja: 人工知能(じんこうちのう)を持(も)った 画像(がぞう)のことだ

translation.en: - So, basically, video game monsters! - I got it!
translation.ja: つまりゲームのモンスターね なるほど

translation.en: Yeah! Didn't like that, did ya?
translation.ja: 今(いま)のきらいだろ？

translation.en: They didn't like that. Run!
translation.ja: きらいだってさ　にげろ

translation.en: Use your gauntlets to drain its power. And get me out of here!
translation.ja: ガントレットで パワーを吸(す)い取(と)れ そしてオレを出せ

translation.en: Uh, hey, BITT? Do these things have multi- target?
translation.ja: マルチターゲットは可能(かのう)？

translation.en: Multi- target activated.
translation.ja: マルチターゲット起動(きどう)

translation.en: - - Come on! Let's get him!
translation.ja: つかまえるぞ

translation.en: Uh, why is he eating the ball pit?
translation.ja: なぜボールプールに？

translation.en: Glitch intelligence is limited to base programming.
translation.ja: 基本(きほん)プログラム並(な)みの 知能(ちのう)しかない

translation.en: Oh, he thinks they're pellets!
translation.ja: フードと まちがえたのね

translation.en: Hurry! I am surrounded by toddler snot!
translation.ja: 急(いそ)げよ　ガキに囲(かこ)まれてる

translation.en: - That gives me a plan. - He loves plans.
translation.ja: 戦略(せんりゃく)を考えた かれも戦略家(せんりゃくか)だよ

translation.en: Uh, heavy!
translation.ja: 重(おも)いな

translation.en: Oh, boy.
translation.ja: しまった

translation.en: - - It thinks you're food. Great plan!
translation.ja: 自分(じぶん)をエサにしたのね

translation.en: Alert! Trainee down!
translation.ja: 警告(けいこく)　訓練生(くんれんせい)がダウン

translation.en: Uh, BITT, can a power- up's effect be reversed?
translation.ja: パワーの減少(げんしょう)は可能(かのう)？

translation.en: Power- ups can be modified to nerf a target.
translation.ja: ターゲットを弱体化(じゃくたいか)させる

translation.en: I'll take that as a yes.
translation.ja: 可能(かのう)ってことで

translation.en: Uh, nice kitty!
translation.ja: いい子ね

translation.en: Looks like game over.
translation.ja: ゲームオーバーかな

translation.en: Delete my browser history!
translation.ja: ブラウザ履歴(りれき)を消して

translation.en: Alert, a Tech needs support.
translation.ja: テックのピンチ

translation.en: Now providing backup assistance!
translation.ja: すぐに応(おう)えんを開始(かいし)

translation.en: - Miko! -
translation.ja: ミコ

translation.en: Here kitty, kitty, kitty, kitty!
translation.ja: ネコちゃん こっちだよ

translation.en: Chomp on this.
translation.ja: ごちそうだ

translation.en: Hey, pro, how'd you like your memory reset?
translation.ja: やあ 名人 きおくをリセットしようか？

translation.en: Wha--
translation.ja: はあ？

translation.en: Caution, a Tech gauntlet is not to be used aggressively.
translation.ja: ガントレットは武(ぶ)器(き)ではない

translation.en: It is a tool to protect innocence, never to harm.
translation.ja: 罪(つみ)のない人たちを守(まも)る道具(どうぐ)だ

translation.en: Yeah? Well, your MVP here really needs to read the dang manual.
translation.ja: マニュアルを読(よ)むべきなのは この人よ

translation.en: You gotta believe me, I wasn't really gonna do it!
translation.ja: 悪気(わるぎ)はなかったんだ

translation.en: I was freaked you wouldn't reset. Everybody resets!
translation.ja: 君(きみ)をリセットできなくて ビビった

translation.en: You stole my win. Why?
translation.ja: なぜボクの勝(か)ちを横取(よこど)りした

translation.en: To protect your lame gamer status?
translation.ja: 今の地(ち)位(い)にしがみつくため？

translation.en: I'm Mitch Williams. I am the number one gamer in this city.
translation.ja: オレはミッチ･ウィリアムズ 街(まち)で一番(いちばん)のゲーマーだ

translation.en: You take that away from me, you may as well take everything.
translation.ja: オレにはゲームしかない

translation.en: Besides, that win was bugged. He wasn't even the real winner.
translation.ja: バグもあった 勝者(しょうしゃ)は かれじゃない

translation.en: - She was. - What?
translation.ja: かのじょだ でも最後(さいご)はファイブが決(き)めた

translation.en: But Five made the winning shot.
translation.ja: でも最後(さいご)はファイブが決(き)めた

translation.en: Yeah, with your ball, remember?
translation.ja: そうだ　君(きみ)のボールで決めた

translation.en: - So I guess you won. - Huh.
translation.ja: じゃあ 君(きみ)の勝(か)ちだ

translation.en: No matter which one of us won, he still loses.
translation.ja: どっちが勝者(しょうしゃ)でも ミッチは負(ま)けだ

translation.en: Please, don't!
translation.ja: やめてくれ

translation.en: If we wipe your precious gaming career, you've got nothing left to protect.
translation.ja: 実績(じっせき)を消(け)せば 君(きみ)はおしまいだ

translation.en: I know I went too far, but do not take this from me.
translation.ja: オレはやりすぎたけど この仕事(しごと)は取(と)らないでくれ

translation.en: It's what I love.
translation.ja: 生(い)きがいなんだ

translation.en: It's who I am.
translation.ja: オレそのものだよ

translation.en: Me, too.
translation.ja: だよね

translation.en: - Me, too. -
translation.ja: ボクも同(おな)じ

translation.en: Come in, Mitch.
translation.ja: ミッチ 応答(おうとう)せよ

translation.en: After the discharge, your signal went viral.  What happened in there?
translation.ja: 君(きみ)のシグナルが拡散(かくさん)したが 何(なに)があった

translation.en: You wanna tell him or should we?
translation.ja: 自分(じぶん)で言(い)う？ 私(わたし)たちが話(はな)す？

translation.en: So... your daughter wasn't lying when she told you
translation.ja: むすめさんの話(はなし)は ウソじゃありません

translation.en: a no- joke- giant- monster hand came out of your TV and trashed your living room.
translation.ja: 巨大(きょだい)な手が画面(がめん)から出て 部(へ)屋(や)をメチャクチャにした

translation.en: I'm sorry, what exactly are you people talking about?
translation.ja: いったい何(なん)の話(はなし)ですか？

translation.en: We're talking about offering your daughter and her friend here
translation.ja: むすめさんとお友(とも)だちに バイトとして

translation.en: part- time jobs in the Hinobi Store's new technical support department.
translation.ja: むすめさんとお友(とも)だちに バイトとして ヒノビで働(はたら)いてほしいんです

translation.en: A job? I do like the sound of that.
translation.ja: 仕事(しごと)？　いいじゃない

translation.en: - Especially if it makes you happy. - Whoo- hoo!
translation.ja: ミコがやりたいなら

translation.en: Thank you, thank you, thank you, thank you, thank you, thank you.
translation.ja: ありがと ありがと ありがと

translation.en: Okay, guys, you can do it now.
translation.ja: じゃあ 始(はじ)めて

translation.en: So, while I restore your system's memory, you will remember this.
translation.ja: メモリを修復(しゅうふく)しますが ひとつ忘(わす)れないで

translation.en: Your daughter's gaming skills have earned her a job with Hinobi Tech Support.
translation.ja: むすめさんのゲームスキルが 仕事(しごと)につながった

translation.en: And you're so proud.
translation.ja: じまんのむすめだね

translation.en: Honey, wasn't Miko just here?
translation.ja: ママ　ミコがいないぞ

translation.en: You know her. Probably wants to be early for that new job of hers.
translation.ja: 仕事(しごと)に備(そな)えて きっと早(はや)くねたのよ

translation.en: So this'll be your day- to- day.
translation.ja: 〝ヒノビ〞 〝ヒノビ〞 案内(あんない)しよう

translation.en: Cash register's here, price gun's here, pooper's in the back and...
translation.ja: レジはそこで トイレは後ろ

translation.en: Oh, yeah. Yeah, the place next door sells old donuts at half off.
translation.ja: となりの店(みせ)では ドーナツが半額(はんがく)になる

translation.en: - That's all? - What's better than half- off donuts?
translation.ja: それだけ？ ドーナツ半額(はんがく)だぞ

translation.en: Exclusive swag, early release games, live events!
translation.ja: 限定(げんてい)グッズや早期(そうき)アクセスや ライブ･イベントは？

translation.en: Yeah, if you earn points, you get the perks.
translation.ja: まずはポイントをかせげ

translation.en: Oh, and there are your lockers.
translation.ja: あと ここがロッカーだ

translation.en: Uh... awesome.
translation.ja: すごいや

translation.en: I got your awesome right here.
translation.ja: 本当(ほんとう)にすごいのはこれだ

translation.en: Excuse me.
translation.ja: ちょっと失礼(しつれい)

translation.en: - Yeah! - Cannonball!
translation.ja: キャノンボールだ！

translation.en: Kids, welcome to Glitch Techs.
translation.ja: ２人とも グリッチ･テックスへ ようこそ

translation.en: - Awesome! - This is amazing!
translation.ja: すごい！
